text: Autumn Leaves is a 1956 movie starring Joan Crawford, Vera Miles, Lorne Greene, and Cliff Robertson. It was directed by Robert Aldrich. It is about a lonely woman who marries an attractive younger man. She is forced to confine him to a mental hospital for her own safety. Nat King Cole sings the movie's theme song. Category:American drama movies Category:1956 drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Aldrich
title: Autumn Leaves
